result.execSummary:
The defendant Daniel Donald Witt was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Violate/Harassment Restraining Order, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 813.125(7).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
- Sign up for Probation on 09/15/22 by 04:30PM 

In the event that the defendant is revoked or discharged from either probation or extended supervision with outstanding financial obligations, the supervising agent shall notify the court 10 days prior to the revocation or discharge.  A civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victim(s) and/or governmental entities for any balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect all debt.

miscConds.notes:
- $243.00 Court Costs, Payable through DOC as a condition of Probation in 22CM283 Count 1. 
- $200.00 DNA Surcharge, Payable through DOC as a condition of Probation in 22CM283 Count 1.

- DNA Sample 
- No Contact with Kelly W; if Restraining Order is lifted, court will consider dropping this condition
- Pay supervision fees
- Follow rules and regulations of Agent

1:16 PM Apprs: CO: SRN, Rpr: Kasten, Clerk: K Kittel. Attorney Brian Thomas Smestad in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Jon Elton Stanek in court w/Defendant Daniel Donald Witt. Atty Smestad states agreement. Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands and pleads Guilty to Ct 1. Court questions Defendant.  Court finds that Defendant has freely and voluntarily entered plea and waived rights. Court accepts plea and finds sufficient facts. Court finds Defendant guilty to Ct 1. Sentencing arguments. DE questions Court, Court responds. Court orders: 

S/W 1 year probation with conditions: 
-$243.00 Court Costs; payable through probation
-$200.00 DNA Sample and Surcharge; payable through probation
-No Contact whatsoever with Kelly W; if Restraining Order is lifted, court will consider dropping this condition
-Sign up for probation by 4:30 pm today 9/15/22
-Pay supervisor fees
-Follow rues and regulations of Agent.
20 days to appeal.

on Request to Appear Remotely. Signed by SRN on 7/14/2022. c: DA and Atty via e-file. km

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Kelly W.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.
